name: physiologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to how the bodies of living things work: Type 2 diabetes and heart disease are physiologically linked. Physiologically, children are not just small adults. See
physiological
More examplesFewer examplesIt's physiologically quite difficult to cry when you are chewing something.These species aren't physiologically equipped to live in cold water.Physiologically, it's simply not possible to ride for 21 straight days and not have a bad day.
